title: Salary Finance Survey Reveals Inflation, Student Loans, Restrictive Housing Market, and Elimination of Child Tax Credit Leading to Increased Financial Stress in American Workers - Business Wire
content: Salary Finance Survey Reveals Inflation, Student Loans, Restrictive Housing Market, and Elimination of Child Tax Credit Leading to Increased Financial Stress in American Workers  Business Wire
description: As the country moves past one crisis and faces another, more American workers are dealing with financial stress, according to a survey by Salary Finan
